title: Humans Botting
body: So does Riot care that the last 10 matches I have had are 90% bots? Trying to do some ARAM and its just people charging to turrets and dieing. Makes this game absolutely worthless. I keep reporting people, but I do not believe reporting ever did anything.

replies.body:
Currently bots aren't able to play Summoners Rift Normals to get levels so change over to this queue.

> [{quoted}](name=Sarutobi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A1WdOnyn,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-09-04T06:37:44.069+0000)
>
> There is a market for a fully leveled account and while some people dont care if it means getting an account only to break the rules or hack its well worth the cost of the account to them.

Not only that, on some websites are even screenshots of accounts which are offered which show the summoner name clearly.
If Riot Games would visit just a single website they would have about half of the offered accounts there banned.

It sucks but as others have said because of how low level you are you will be confronted by botted accounts. There really isnt anything we can do aside from reporting them and hopefully the detection Riot has catches these types of bots. Put into account bot bans are done in waves (to confuse the programmers/devs of the bot) this is sadly what happens when you make a free to play game and a popular one at that. There is a market for a fully leveled account and while some people dont care if it means getting an account only to break the rules or hack its well worth the cost of the account to them.

Reporting bots helps Riot fine-tune their [detection algorithms](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/QAhwmGWy-riot-its-time-for-you-to-take-action-now-not-later?comment=005a). In the meantime, you'll pretty much just have to suck it up. You should (hopefully) run into less bots as you level up and increase your MMR.

You are lv7. Lv5 aram is just bots, because real newbs dont play aram.

Just wait a bit, the average lifespan of a bot involves being banned before lv10.
Its because you're so low level. Play some normal SR's until your MMR increases. I would say play SR until around level 20 or so.
